title: Unwise and foolish creations of fancy
creator_credit: Sally McCutcheon, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Sally McCutcheon tells her story, threaded together by her two life-long passions, dancing and beading. Through determination, discipline and the support of her family, McCutcheon has managed to excel at both at different stages of her life.
creator_credit_for_label: Sally McCutcheon, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
